name: downloader
description: Download the kubectl, istioctl, and helm. Also It enable to use these command.
author: Tsuyoshi Ushio

inputs.name: k8sService
inputs.label: k8s end point
inputs.helpMarkDowls 0n: Select Kubernetes endo point to use.

inputs.name: kubectlBinary
inputs.label: kubectl binary
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select your local kubectl if available (leave blank to download)

inputs.name: downloadVersion
inputs.label: kubectl download version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the kubectl version to download e.g. 'v1.5.2' (leave blank for latest)

inputs.name: hasIstio
inputs.label: Enable istioctl
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable istioctl. Download and add PATH environment.

inputs.name: IstioVersion
inputs.label: istioctl download version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the istioctl version to download e.g. '0.1.6' by default 0.1.6

inputs.name: hasHelm
inputs.label: Enable helm
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable helm. Download and add PATH environment.

inputs.name: helmVersion
inputs.label: helm download version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the heml version to download e.g. '2.5.0' by default 2.5.0
